title: Scenario: Verify an Ad Banner Can Be Added to the Bottom of the Ballpark Summary Page
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the Ballpark Summary page for a team
custom_steps: When a developer(or anyone who can administer admarvel) launches an add for that team
custom_expected:
Then an Ad Banner will be seen at the bottom of the team's Ballpark Summary page 
But will not be visible in other team's summary pages

title: Scenario: Verify an Ad Banner Can Be Removed from the Bottom of the Ballpark Summary
custom_preconds:
Given the user is in the ballpark summary page
And an ad has been issued for the team 
And the add appears at the bottom of the page
custom_steps: When a developer(or anyone who can administer admarvel) removes the ad
custom_expected: Then the user will no longer be able to see the ad at the bottom of the page

title: Scenario: Verify an Ad Banner Can Be Added to the Bottom of the Event Details screen
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the Event Detail page for a team
custom_steps: When a developer(or anyone who can administer admarvel) launches an ad to the Event Detail page for the specific team
custom_expected:
Then the add will appear in the Bottom of the Event Details screen
But will not be visible in any other Event Detail views

title: Scenario: Verify an Ad Banner Can be Removed from the Bottom of the Event Details screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user is in the Event Detail view for a given event
And an ad banner has been issued for the event
And the banner appears in the navbar
custom_steps: When a developer(or anyone who can administer admarvel) removes the ad
custom_expected: Then the ad will no longer appear in the Bottom of the Event Details screen

title: Scenario: Verify an Ad Banner Can be Mass-Added to All Ballpark Summary Navbars At Once
custom_preconds: Given At the Ballpark has been launched
custom_steps: When a developer(or anyone who can administer admarvel) launches an add for all teams
custom_expected: Then the ad will be visible in the navbar of the Game Summary page for each team

title: Scenario: Verify a Mass-Added Ad Banner Can be Removed
custom_preconds: Given an ad for all teams has been launched from admarvel
custom_steps: When the campaign has been removed by a developer(or anyone who can administer admarvel)
custom_expected: Then the ad banner will not appear in the navbar for of the Ballpark Summary for any of the teams

title: Scneario: Popups should only show once per user - verify the same popup does not appear in subsequent sessions
custom_preconds:
Given that you have installed the QA-Test Build
And you have enabled the extra URL
custom_steps: When the user sees the popup and then the pop up is closed or opened.
custom_expected: Then the popup will never display to that user again even after the app is restarted.

title: Scenario: After closing a popup, have a developer create a new one to make sure subsequent popups are received
custom_preconds:
Given
A popup has been closed out by the user
custom_steps:
When
Another popup is added by Dev.
custom_expected:
Then
The user should see the new popup - they should not be prevented from seeing any new popups and they should not see the one that they had previously closed out.

title: Scenario: Popups can be dismissed by tapping the close button
custom_preconds:
Given
There is a popup that is created that has only one button and that is used to close the popup.
custom_steps:
When
The user sees this popup
custom_expected:
Then
Clicking that one button closes the popup.

title: Scenario: Popups can can link to a web page with a button
custom_preconds:
Given
A popup is created with 2 buttons
1 - to close it
2 - to open a page in the browser
custom_steps:
When
This popup is seen by the user
custom_expected:
Then
The second button should open the browser
and
the first button should still be checked to verify that the close button still works in this scenario. 
(may be needed to be launched twice)
